pullrequest.title: Several MSVC fixes: standard pointers and enable FreeImage/Ogre in Windows (take II)

content.raw: After the latest changes the Windows build still find and compile ogre paths and conditionals without error \(note that all the changes here have been propagated to the win\_fixes2 branch\) [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign\_render\_win/189/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_render_win/189/)
content.html: After the latest changes the Windows build still find and compile ogre paths and conditionals without error (note that all the changes here have been propagated to the win_fixes2 branch) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_render_win/189/
